dict.string:
I'm lucky, I never doubted computer programming was my passion, so I didn't have any trouble choosing my degree. Neither did my other two friends.
We were also pretty sure we wanted to make a company.

So we did. We made a company that creates smart media.
Apps, web aplications... software.
But we focus on making that software not just functional, but also visually attractive and with a purpose. We want our software to give other companies a real competitive value.
